'''Svep Studios''' is an animation studio, known for creating cinematics for video games. Among their portfolio are many contributions to the [[Minecraft (franchise)|''Minecraft'']] franchise, such as the cutscenes of {{MCD}} and a cinematic trailers of Minecraft.
